TitleEnglish: A Portrait of Jianghu : Bad Guys
SummaryEnglish: Two martial artists are brutally killed by a team of assassins, leaving their wards, a young boy and girl, defenseless. A martial arts master dispatches of the assassins, sparing their lives, and decides to take them in. He raises them and teaches them martial arts.
Aliases: Hua Jiang Hu: Bu Liang Ren

1.TitleEnglish: Hua Jiang Hu Zhi: Tian Gang
